titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that cafeteria plans which provide for grandfathered 401(k) plans may also provide for contributions to section 457 plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/19/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a cafeteria plan to include an eligible deferred compensation plan if the cafeteria plan also provides for a qualified cash or deferred arrangement adopted by a State or local government or political subdivision before May 6, 1986.
